metadata.name: Organization Ontology
metadata.description: Core organization entity definition - simple structure for identifying organizations within the platform
metadata.creator: BAIV Platform Team
metadata.purpose: Define the basic organization entity that all other ontologies reference

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Direct mapping to schema.org Organization with platform-specific type classifications

entities.name: Organization
entities.description: Core organization entity representing any business or entity within the platform ecosystem

properties.name: legalName
properties.description: Official legal name if different from display name

properties.name: type
properties.description: Organization's relationship type to the platform

entities.name: OrganizationContext
entities.description: Rich contextual data and metadata associated with an organization including history and preferences

properties.name: contextId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the organization context record

properties.name: notes
properties.description: Free-form notes and observations about the organization
properties.example: Key decision maker is the CTO

properties.name: lastUpdated
properties.description: Timestamp when context was last modified

relationships.name: Has Context
relationships.description: Links organization to its rich context data containing notes and metadata

relationships.name: Context Belongs To
relationships.description: Inverse relationship linking context data back to its parent organization

relationships.name: Is Client Of
relationships.description: Organization is a client of another organization (e.g., agency relationship)

relationships.name: Is Competitor Of
relationships.description: Organization competes with another organization in the same market

relationships.name: Is Partner Of
relationships.description: Organization has a formal partnership relationship with another organization

relationships.name: Is Affiliate Of
relationships.description: Organization is an affiliate or referral partner of another organization

businessRules.name: Unique Organization ID
businessRules.description: Each organization must have a unique organizationId
businessRules.condition: IF an Organization is created or updated
businessRules.constraint: THEN organizationId MUST be unique across all organizations in the platform

businessRules.name: Competitor Relationship Restriction
businessRules.description: Organization type constrains which relationships are valid
businessRules.constraint: THEN Organization MUST NOT have isClientOf relationship to any other organization

businessRules.name: Context Requires Parent Organization
businessRules.description: OrganizationContext must always be linked to an organization
businessRules.constraint: THEN it MUST have exactly one contextBelongsTo relationship to a valid Organization

businessRules.name: Active Status Required for Relationships
businessRules.description: Only active organizations can participate in business relationships
businessRules.constraint: THEN Organization MUST NOT be the domain of isClientOf, isPartnerOf, or isAffiliateOf relationships

examples.notes: High-growth potential client with strong technical leadership
